name: Hummus Clicker
description:
Hummus Clicker is an idle clicker game which pokes fun of all the horrible combination of hummus you can find in North America.

Design, art, code: Yifat Shaik (@yifatshaik)

Music: Gary Martin

How to play: Start by clicking on the ingredients (chickpea, olive,lemon etc.) as their number increase it will open up more things you can click on!
